name: settings-combiner
description: Merge multiple JSON files into a single settings.json to allow shared team and uncommitted personal settings

settingsCombiner.inputs.description: List of files in .vscode to deep merge into .vscode/settings.json, later settings will take precedence

settingsCombiner.output.description: Path of the output file to write the merged settings to

settingsCombiner.runAtStart.description: Run the combination check when the editor is opened.

settingsCombiner.watchForChanges.description: Run the combination check when any of the specified files are changed.

settingsCombiner.warnDiff.description: When set to true you will be warned if the combined settings file is different from the current settings file and have an option to backup the current settings.

settingsCombiner.addComment.description: Add a comment to the top of the settings.json file to indicate that it is generated by the settings combiner.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
